name: Friends
description: Could this quiz BE any harder? Test your knowledge of the gang.

questions.question: What is the name of the coffee shop where the friends spend most of their time?
Ross and Monica Geller are brother and sister.
What is Joey Tribbiani's famous catchphrase?
In the pilot episode, Rachel Green arrives at Monica's apartment in a wedding dress after leaving her fiancé at the altar.
What city is Friends primarily set in?
Monica Geller is a professional chef.
What is Ross Geller's area of scientific expertise?
Chandler Bing and Monica Geller get married during the course of the series.
What is the name of Phoebe Buffay's most famous song?
Joey Tribbiani is an actor by profession.
How many seasons of Friends are there?
At the very end of the series, Rachel gets off a plane to stay with Ross.
What instrument does Phoebe play when performing her songs?
At the end of the series, Monica and Chandler move out of the city to the suburbs.
What is the name of Joey's beloved stuffed penguin?
Ross Geller is married three times over the course of the series.
What is Rachel's job at the very beginning of the series?
Joey and Chandler lived together as roommates for most of the series.
What color are the iconic walls of Monica's apartment?
Phoebe Buffay has an identical twin sister named Ursula.
Who does Phoebe eventually marry in the series?
Ross's first wife Carol left him for a woman named Susan Bunch.
What is the name of Joey's theatrical agent throughout most of the series?
Rachel's last name before any marriage is Green.
The group refers to their unseen neighbor across the way as what?
The Friends theme song 'I'll Be There for You' is performed by The Rembrandts.
Chandler quits his job in data processing and starts a new career in advertising.
Which holiday does Monica take most seriously and always insists on hosting?
Ross and Rachel drunkenly get married during a trip to Las Vegas.
What company does Rachel work for in the later seasons of the show?
Gunther, the manager of Central Perk, has an unrequited crush on Rachel throughout the series.
What is the name of Ross's son with his ex-wife Carol?
Phoebe Buffay worked as a masseuse and massage therapist.
Rachel and Ross have a daughter together named Emma.
What is the name of Monica and Ross's father?
Joey Tribbiani starred in a soap opera called Days of Our Lives.
What is the name of the character Joey plays on Days of Our Lives?
Chandler's parents divorced when he was a young child.
What is the name of Ross and Rachel's daughter?
The Friends series finale aired in 2004.
Who officiates Monica and Chandler's wedding ceremony?
Rachel and Monica were friends who knew each other in high school.
Who is Monica's serious boyfriend before Chandler, who is much older than her?
Richard Burke was a friend of Monica's parents before he started dating her.
In what year did Friends first premiere on NBC?
Matthew Perry portrayed the character of Chandler Bing.
What is Chandler's last name?
At the end of the series, Monica and Chandler adopt twins.
What is Rachel wearing when she first appears in the pilot episode?
Phoebe's twin sister Ursula appeared on another NBC sitcom called Mad About You before Friends.
What is the name of the absurd fake game show Joey appears on as a contestant?
As a condition of their marriage, Emily demanded that Ross never see or speak to Rachel again.
What does Chandler's father do for a living in Las Vegas?
options: Performs as a drag entertainer in a Las Vegas show

questions.question: Chandler's mother is a famous romance novelist.
Who does Joey accidentally propose to after finding the engagement ring Chandler bought for Monica?
The apartment numbers in Monica's building were changed between the pilot episode and later episodes.
What is the name of Ross's legendary Thanksgiving leftover sandwich?
The famous 'we were on a break' argument started after Ross slept with someone from the copy place while he and Rachel were separated.
Which celebrity guest stars as Rachel Green's younger sister Jill?
Brad Pitt guest starred in a Thanksgiving episode as a former classmate who despised Rachel in high school.
Who wins Monica and Rachel's apartment in the trivia game episode?
options: Nobody — it ends in a draw

questions.question: Monica and Rachel lose the apartment trivia game because they cannot correctly name what Chandler does for a living.
What is Phoebe's go-to fake name when she wants to use an alias?
After marrying Mike, Phoebe legally changes her name to Princess Consuela Banana-Hammock.
What card game do the men and women in the group play competitively against each other?
Joey's soap opera character Dr. Drake Ramoray was killed off and then brought back via a brain transplant storyline.
What is the full name of Ross's second wife, whom he marries in London?
At his wedding to Emily, Ross accidentally says Rachel's name at the altar.
Which well-known actor plays Monica's older love interest Richard Burke?
Bruce Willis guest starred in Friends as the overprotective father of a student Ross was dating.
Phoebe acts as a surrogate mother and carries triplets for her brother Frank Jr. and his wife Alice.
What is the name of Phoebe's younger brother she carries triplets for?
Frank Jr.'s wife Alice is significantly older than him.
What fake name does Joey typically use when he wants to remain anonymous while picking up women?
Ross has a complete meltdown at work after a colleague eats his prized Thanksgiving leftover sandwich.
Monica dates a millionaire named Pete Becker who aspires to become the Ultimate Fighting Champion.
Joey was the first of the friend group to discover that Monica and Chandler were in a relationship.
The letter Rachel writes to Ross demanding he accept responsibility for their breakup is 18 pages long, front and back.
How long is the letter Rachel writes to Ross about their breakup?
Where do Monica and Chandler first become romantically involved?
options: A hotel in London during Ross's wedding
On a vacation in the Bahamas

questions.question: Monica's apartment is rent-controlled and she inherited it from her grandmother.
In the two-part 'The One That Could Have Been' episode, Phoebe's alternate-universe self is a Wall Street stock broker.
Chandler once travels all the way to Yemen to avoid having to break up with Janice.
In one episode, Ross gets a spray tan that keeps getting darker because he doesn't turn around in the booth correctly.
What does Monica make as part of a new life plan after breaking up with Richard Burke?
After her breakup with Richard, Monica devises a plan to start making and selling jam.
Who plays Janice, Chandler's recurring on-and-off girlfriend?
Janice always announces her presence with her signature 'Oh my God!' exclamation.
What is the occupation of Barry Farber, Rachel's ex-fiancé who she left at the altar?
In 'The One with All the Cheesecakes,' Chandler and Rachel eat cheesecakes delivered to their neighbor by mistake.
What happens to Chandler whenever someone tries to take his photograph?
options: He refuses to be in photos
He makes an uncontrollable bizarre fake smile

questions.question: There is an episode in which Chandler is physically unable to smile naturally for engagement photos.
What causes Phoebe to break up with Gary, the police officer she was dating?
options: He arrests one of her friends
He shoots a bird outside their window
He wants to move in together too fast

questions.question: Phoebe ends her relationship with police officer Gary after he shoots a songbird outside their window one morning.
What instrument does Ross play at Monica and Chandler's wedding, to everyone's dismay?
Ross plays the bagpipes at Monica and Chandler's wedding, and he is not very good at it.
Who is the last of the friend group to learn that Monica and Chandler are in a relationship?
Ross is the last of the friends to discover Monica and Chandler's relationship, finding out while they are in London.
What does Chandler do on Thanksgiving to apologize to Joey for kissing his girlfriend Kathy?
options: Sit silently in a wooden box for hours

questions.question: Chandler spends an entire Thanksgiving sitting inside a wooden box as a grand gesture to prove he is sorry to Joey.
What is Chandler Bing's embarrassing middle name?
Chandler is embarrassed by his middle name Muriel, which he tries to keep secret.
What is the full job description Chandler gives that no one in the group can ever remember?
In 'The One with the Embryos,' the question that Monica and Rachel cannot answer correctly is what Chandler does for a living.
Which actress plays Rachel's college sorority friend Melissa, with whom Rachel shared a drunken kiss?
Winona Ryder guest starred as Rachel's college sorority sister Melissa, with whom Rachel had shared a drunken kiss.
Bruce Willis donated his Friends guest star paycheck to charity after losing a bet to Matthew Perry.
Which film did Matthew Perry and Bruce Willis work on together, leading to Willis's Friends guest appearance?
In a Thanksgiving flashback episode, Monica accidentally drops a knife and cuts off part of Chandler's toe.
What does Joey put on all at once during his argument with Chandler over a chair in 'The One Where No One's Ready'?
options: Chandler's entire wardrobe layer by layer

questions.question: In 'The One Where No One's Ready,' Joey wears all of Chandler's underwear at once as an act of revenge for Chandler taking his seat.
What Jewish holiday does Ross dress as the 'Holiday Armadillo' to teach his son Ben about?
Ross creates the Holiday Armadillo character because he could not find a Santa Claus costume and wanted to teach Ben about Hanukkah.
When the Smelly Cat music video is made, the singing voice used in the final video is dubbed over with a different singer's voice — not Phoebe's.
What is the name of Brad Pitt's character in the Thanksgiving episode where he reveals his hatred of Rachel?
Who actually founded the 'I Hate Rachel Green Club' in high school?
Ross co-founded the 'I Hate Rachel Green Club' in high school despite secretly having a crush on her.
'The One with the Embryos' follows two storylines simultaneously — the trivia game and what else?
options: Phoebe's embryo implantation for Frank Jr.'s triplets

questions.question: What does Phoebe find inside a soda can early in the series that earns her a cash settlement from the company?
Phoebe wins money from a soda company after finding a human thumb inside her can.
Joey's agent Estelle Leonard passes away in Season 10, and Joey has to cope with losing her.
The gold picture frame around the peephole on Monica's apartment door began as an on-set accident that the producers decided to keep.
What does Ross do to bond with Ugly Naked Guy and convince him to hand over his apartment?
options: Gets naked and spends naked time with him
Offers him free museum tickets for life

questions.question: To secure Ugly Naked Guy's apartment, Ross strips naked and the two bond over shared nudity together.
After being given away to a zoo, Ross's monkey Marcel eventually becomes an actor appearing in TV shows and movies.
What type of monkey is Ross's pet Marcel?
Marcel the monkey appears primarily in Season 1 before being given away to a zoo.
Which of Joey's girlfriends does Chandler fall in love with, causing a major rift between the two friends?
Chandler falls for a woman named Kathy who was originally Joey's girlfriend, fracturing their friendship.
As his grand gesture to apologize to Joey, Chandler agrees to sit silently inside a wooden box for the entire Thanksgiving dinner.
Which actor plays Frank Jr., Phoebe's younger brother who she eventually acts as surrogate for?
Giovanni Ribisi plays Phoebe's younger brother Frank Jr.
Which actor plays David, the scientist who is one of Phoebe's most serious love interests?
David the scientist moves to Minsk, Belarus for a research opportunity, ending his relationship with Phoebe.
What is the first name of Phoebe's birth mother, revealed later in the series?
Phoebe's birth mother shares the same first name as Phoebe herself — she is also named Phoebe.
Which actor plays Tag Jones, Rachel's younger assistant whom she dates for a period?
Rachel dates her assistant Tag Jones, played by actor Eddie Cahill.
After Friends ended, Joey Tribbiani starred in his own spinoff series. What was it simply titled?
After Friends concluded, the character of Joey Tribbiani starred in a spinoff series titled 'Joey.'
Monica becomes head chef at Alessandro's restaurant after challenging and defeating the existing head chef in a cook-off.
What unusual physical characteristic does Chandler have that becomes the subject of an episode?
Chandler has a small extra nipple — referred to as a 'nubbin' — which he eventually has surgically removed.
What is Chandler's mother's first name?
Chandler's mother Nora Tyler Bing is a successful and famous romance novelist.
Which actress plays Chandler's mother, Nora Tyler Bing?
Morgan Fairchild plays Chandler's mother in Friends.
What is the final image shown in the very last shot of the Friends series finale?
options: The six friends walking away together
Monica and Chandler's new suburban house
The orange couch at Central Perk

questions.question: The final shot of the Friends series finale shows Monica's empty apartment with its iconic purple walls.
What iconic design element on Monica's apartment door became one of the most recognized images of the show?
options: A gold picture frame around the peephole
